We have class CustomDense. Docstring empty. Method summaries: __init__, build, call, get_config. So it's likely a custom Keras layer that implements a dense layer. So summary: class defines a custom dense neural network layer with configurable parameters, handling weight initialization, forward computation, and serialization. Business intent: to provide a flexible dense layer for deep learning models, enabling custom behavior while integrating with Keras/TensorFlow. Keywords: custom layer, dense, neural network, Keras, TensorFlow, weight initialization, forward pass, serialization, configuration.
